mapper.update: update major set major_name = #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major_status = #{majorStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, major_area = #{majorArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, details = #{details,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where major_id = #{majorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select major_id, major_name, major_status, delete_flag, major_area, details from major
